title: Remote Education and Narrative Reflection in the Pandemic Era: Changes in Teachers' Pedagogy and Student Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Experience with Social Networking Services (SNS)
context.additional_context: Analyzing the impact of COVID-19 on educational environments for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields and exploring practical applications through Instagram-based narrative reflection

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three changes in teaching methodologies that emerged in the remote education environment caused by COVID-19.
Learners can structure and share their educational experiences through narrative reflections in the format of Instagram posts.
Learners can design and present effective learning strategies in pandemic situations through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
